EmailTemplate.name: Programmes 2013: BEN launch event invite
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge 2013 Launch Event, Barnet & Enfield
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
THE CHALLENGE AND YOU IN BARNET AND ENFIELD, 2013
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} ,
We would like to invite you to join us on Wednesday 12th June for the opportunity to hear more about The Challenge in your borough this year. Come along to meet colleagues from the many inspiring community organisations we're working with this year and to hear more about how you fit into our summer programmes.
There will be snacks and refreshments on arrival.
Please RSVP by replying to this email by Friday 24th May, and we very much look forward to seeing you there! Where: The Beech Room Oakhill College London N14 4PS
When: Wednesday 12th June 4.00-6.00pm
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG /thechallengeNETWORK
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
